title: FS: T213's w/ many HOF's (Top of the Pops)
author: Donavon

posts.post_title: FS: T213's w/ many HOF's (Top of the Pops)
posts.post_content:
These are the cleanest 1914 T213-2's I have ever laid eyes on regardless of technical grade. Most are either highest graded or right at the top of the population reports. Even the 2's look EX to EX-MT. They are truly beautiful. Prices include signature confirmation & insurance on cards above $250 & delivery confirmation for cards less than $250. Payment by money order, cashier's check, & personal check are accepted. Personal checks will have to clear before cards are shipped. I will also accept Paypal, but 3% will have to be added to the total to cover fees. Please email before sending payment.

GRADED:

Germany Schaefer (K.C. Fed. - W on Shirt) - PSA 4.5 (Pop. 1 Highest Graded) Probably the rarest variation in the set. - $400

Ty Cobb (Bat Off Shoulder) - PSA 3 (Way nicer than the only PSA 4-old flip) - $3000

Christy Mathewson - PSA 3 (Easily upgradeable w/ re-grade-old flip) - $1000

Tris Speaker - PSA 4 (Appears nicer than the only PSA 5 in which Goodwin & Co. just auctioned-see for yourself) - $1500

Eddie Collins (Philadelphia Amer.-A on shirt) - PSA 5 (Pop. 1 Highest Graded) - $1500

Nap Lajoie (Cleveland) - PSA 4 (Pop. 1 Highest Graded) - $1500

Zach Wheat (Brooklyn Nat.) - PSA 4 (Pop. 1 Highest Graded) - $600

Roger Bresnahan (Toledo) - PSA 3 (Pop. 1 Highest Graded) - $325

Miller Huggins (Hands at Mouth) - PSA 2 (Pop. 1 Highest Graded) - $250

Rube Marquard (Pitching-NY Shirt) - PSA 3 (Pop. 1 Highest Graded) - $300

Rube Marquard (Portrait-NY Shirt) - PSA 2 (Much Nicer) - $200

John McGraw (Portrait) - PSA 2 MC (Was SGC 30) - $200

Joe Tinker (Chi. Fed.-Bat Off) - PSA 2 (Much Nicer) - $250

Larry Doyle (Batting) - PSA 3 (Pop. 1 Highest Graded) - $200

Dots Miller - PSA 4 (1 Example graded higher) - $250

Jack Warhop (New York) - PSA 3 (1 Example graded higher) - $200

Bill Sweeney (Chicago) - SGC 30 (Very Nice) - $100

Ira Thomas (Philadelphia Amer.) - SGC 30 (Very Nice) - $85


The following are RAW:

Ed Summers (Brooklyn Fed.) - No visible creases or wrinkles. Small paper loss on back from cigarette pack. - $75

Russ Ford (Buffalo Fed.) - G/VG+  - $75

Rube Oldring (Philadelphia Amer.) - G/VG+ (Vertical Crease) - $65


UNOPENED COUPON PACK (Circa 1920's - Extremely clean & rare) - SOLD
